title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config & data into a single Modelfile.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with chat history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models directly from the editor.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + vector DB for private docs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama over its REST API.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that calls Ollama for private on-prem LLM answers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on your vault notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming support.

title: ollama-android
summary: Experimental Android app that talks to Ollama over local HTTP/Wi-Fi.
